children.subject: 170 and 188 are doable for sure. Last Spring I had CS 188 Final at 3-6pm followed by CS 170 Final at 7-10pm followed by CS 61C Final at 10pm-1am (the only alternative time), and I did well on all of them, yet it was pretty draining, emotionally and mentally speaking, but hey, I knew that this would be my schedule and I was ok with that.

history.content:
Hey guys,

At this point I think my best schedule option for next semester is taking CS 170 and CS 188 together (I am a sophomore taking 70 right now, so I am planning to declare after this semester), but my only concern is that their finals are only one hour apart. Does anyone have any experience with two very difficult finals so close together/advice on whether I should avoid this combination because of this? I would have taken 170 and EE 16A but they are at the same time and neither will offer alternate finals, and I think that 170 and 61C would be too difficult for me to handle. Any ideas would be appreciated because I kind of feel stuck in terms of my schedule, thanks very much!!!!
history.subject: Opinions on two finals with only 1 hour between them?
